Some of my Works and Projects!

Okay, so what is this?

This is employee login page, a fast, secure and responsive web application which allows the employee to see their profile and also browse through fellow employees profile based on the authorization. The features of the page includes ability to search through member database, display member thumbnail image and even assign permission if manager or human resource member. The programming languages and technologies this application used are C#, Asp.net, javaScript, jQuery, BootStrap, CSS3, Ajax, SQl server stored procedure, Visual Studio, SQL server Management Studio and Agent Ransack.

What is this project about?

Manually Upload Tracking Number is a one page web application which allows the employee to manually upload the tracking number of a shipment to the system. This was my first project while working at Fun.com It was a fun filled project which utilizes different concept, programming languages and tools. The concept that this project utilizes are listview, modal window and stored procedure. The programming languages that was used for this project are C#, Asp.net, HTML5, CSS3, javaScript, jQuery, BootStrap, MS SQL server and Ajax. The tools that was required for this project are Microsoft Visual studio, Chrome Developer Tools, SQL Server Management Studio, Beyond Compare and Agent Ransack.

Games Everywhere!

Bounce Up Zone is a 2D game in Google play store and itunes store which utilizes some of the advance animation and visual effect concept. The game was developed using Unity 3D and Buildbox while the graphics of this game is made with Sketch App. The programming language that is used to develop this game is C# and it uses realm database management system as a backend.

Some more Games and Web Projects I have worked on


Ninja Warrior Run - Dragon Slasher

This is a 2D platformer game, a fast, optimized and responsive iphone and ipad game. The gameplay of this particular game is a ninja character who jump across platforms, collect coins and avoid obstacles. The programming language the game is developed on is C# and the tools used to develop this game is Unity3D, Buildbox and Xcode. The image software used for graphics purpose is Sketch App. The game also features in-app purchases and integrated ads.

Gangsta Prison Escape: A Mobster Break From Jail Time

This 2D gaem which is developed for iphone and ipad is an endless runner game. It is optimized to run on even lower versions of iphone and runs smoothly. The software IDE which is used to develop it is Unity3D and the image application used for its graphics element is sketch app. It makes the use of SQL database system. The programming language used to develop this game is C# and the tools used are Buildbox and Xcode. It makes minimal use of Swift snippets. Also, it features in-app purchases and ads.

Time-off Request Web application

Time-off Request is a one-page web application developed in ASP.net. The page was developed in order to make the employee at fun.com easy to submit the time-off request. The features of this page is automatic calculation of leave hours requested based on selected date, subtracts any public holiday automatically if it falls between the start and end date, shows error if the same type and amount of leave is selected (i.e prevents duplicate entry). The programming language used to develop this applications are C#, Asp.net, javaScript, KnockOutJS, HTML5, CSS3, Ajax, BootStrap and SQL Server. The tools that were used are Visual Studio, SQL server management studio, Agent Ransack and Beyond Compare.
